name: mcp-server-iaptic
description: Connect AIs to Iaptic data for customer and transaction insights.

rating.reason: Excellent documentation quality across all tools. Names are clear and specific, descriptions are comprehensive (2-4 sentences) covering functionality, usage context, and key limitations, and parameters include detailed descriptions with examples and constraints. The toolset consistently provides complete information needed for effective usage, with proper bullet-point formatting and helpful details like default values, format examples, and important notes.
